Interface GraphBuilder

        properties - Configurable used to configure the algorithm

        Returns:

      • checkProperties

        default boolean checkProperties()
        Method to check if the configuration is correct to build a Graph. It check if the builder needs some configuration to work
        Returns:

      • buildEdges

        void buildEdges(DiagramGraph target,
                DiagramGraph data)
        Method to add to a target Graph the edges required to finish the new Graph created by this builder with buildNodes(DiagramGraph, Configurable)
        Parameters:
        target - DiagramGraph where we will add the new edges
        data - DiagramGraph from we will take information to create the edges.
